page.title: 09Health in Wootton Bassett
page.content: The people in our area have to go to {Princess Margeret hospital}in Swindon or{Wroughton Hospital}if they are seriously ill.They are open 24 hours a day all week.They have 774 beds. There is one{Health Clinic}in our area.This is where the babies go to have their progress checked by the health visitor. They are also vacinated here. There are two{surgeries,}one in Tinkers Field with 5 doctors and another in the Civic Centre with 3 doctors.They are open from 9am to 12 noon and 5pm to 7pm.There is usally one doctor on call. The{school nurse}comes every term to check our hair for head lice and regularly looks at our sight and hearing. The{doctor}and{dentist}visit school frequently to check that we are healthy.
